articles.description: Colorado spoiled Texas’s home opener with some help from a replay review.
articles.content:
The Rockies outlasted the Rangers in 10 innings on Monday, but not without a little controversy. 
After Colorado scored two runs in the top of the 10th to take a 6–4 lead, Texas found itself in a po… [+1457 chars]
